entry.title: Tahoe Tack 14” Replacement Leather Breakaway Crown for Mini Horse Halters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Accessories
Price: 4.99

Our miniature horse sized leather breakaway halter crown piece is a great replacement for your old, worn-out, or damaged crownpiece and was designed specifically to fit mini horse sized halters. This crown piece measures 14” long and is ⅝” wide, making it compatible with most leather or nylon miniature horse halters.

  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST MINI HALTERS - this leather crown piece measures 14” long by ⅝” wide and has holes on either side for maximum adjustability.
  • INCREASES YOUR HORSE’S SAFETY - breakaway halters are designed with a leather crown that will break under pressure in order to free your horse to help prevent injury or loss of life.
  • DURABLE SOLID LEATHER - this crown piece is made from durable and attractive flat leather. With proper care, this crown piece will last for years before needing to be replaced.
  • GREAT FOR THE PASTURE AND TRAILER - breakaway crowns are ideal for use when your horse is turned out, inside the trailer, or tied up to crossties in order to prevent injury.
  • DEEP HAVANA BROWN COLOR - this leather crown piece comes in a dark Havana brown that is designed to best match most leather or nylon halters.

entry.title: Derby Originals Double Stitched Leather Breakaway Halter Replacement Crown Available in 2 Lengths
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Accessories
Price: 6.99

Derby Originals Double Stitched Leather Breakaway Halter Replacement Crown Available in 21" and 25" Lengths are a high-quality, attractive breakaway option that is designed with your horse’s safety in mind. Breakaway halters are designed to be safer for your horse to wear because they have a leather crown that is weaker than your horse. This means that if your horse becomes stuck, tangled, or hooked on something in the stall or pasture, they can free themselves instead of remaining stuck. Breakaway halters save many horses’ lives each year! Our breakaway halter crownpieces are available in 21” and 25” lengths. 21” is ideal for most Cob/Arab to Full/Average sized horses, while 25” is ideal for most Full/Average to Oversize/Warmblood sized horses. These breakaway crowns are available in the colors Black and Brown.


  • UNIVERSAL BREAKAWAY HALTER CROWN - our 21” and 25” breakaway crown replacement pieces measure 1” in width and are designed to fit all standard 1” wide leather or nylon halters.
  • PROMOTES SAFETY IN THE PASTURE OR STALL - our breakaway crowns are designed to break when a large amount of force is applied to prevent your horse from getting caught or spooked and injuring themselves.
  • ADJUSTABLE FIT - our breakaway crown pieces have 5 holes spaced 1” apart on each side of the crown, which allows you to adjust the fit of your halter’s crown by up to 8” to allow for use with multiple horses or growth.
  • AVAILABLE IN TWO LENGTHS - our breakaway halter crownpieces are available in 21” and 25” lengths. 21” is ideal for most Cob/Arab to Full/Average sized horses, while 25” is ideal for most Full/Average to Oversize/Warmblood sized horses.
  • AVAILABLE IN TWO COLORS - our leather double-stitched halter crowns are available in the colors Black and Brown so you can find the perfect crown to match your leather or nylon halter.

entry.title: Derby Originals Replacement Leather Tab for Breakaway Horse Safety Halters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Accessories
Price: 2.75

Product Description: Derby Originals’ Replacement Leather Tab for Breakaway Horse Safety Halters can be used to easily turn your nylon halter into a breakaway halter. This allows you to inexpensively create a safe turnout halter without buying a new one! This thin piece of leather is designed so that if your horse panics, it will snap so that your horse can escape without becoming trapped. This has saved many horse’s lives during pasture or barn accidents.

  • CONVERT YOUR HALTER TO A SAFETY HALTER - our breakaway tabs can be used to easily turn your nylon halter into a breakaway halter. This allows you to inexpensively create a safe turnout halter without buying a new one!

  • USE TO REPAIR BREAKAWAY HALTERS - if your old breakaway halter has become worn or broken, all you have to do to replace it is easily undo the chicago screws and attach our replacement tab!
  • MAKE YOUR HALTER SAFER - this thin piece of leather is designed so that if your horse panics, it will snap so that your horse can escape without becoming trapped. This has saved many horse’s lives during pasture or barn accidents.
  • UNIQUE DOUBLE SCREW DESIGN - most breakaway tabs only feature one chicago screw, while ours has two for a more secure fit.
  • AVAILABLE IN TWO COLORS - our breakaway halter tabs are available in two leather colors: dark oil and tan leather.

entry.title: Derby Originals Animal Print Fleece Halter Cover Sets - Available in Multiple Styles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Accessories
Price: 1.95

If you are looking for a fun and colorful alternative to plain fleece halter covers, our Derby Originals Animal Print Fleece Halter Cover Sets are perfect for you! These halter cover sets include four fleece pieces to cover the crown, both cheek pieces, and the noseband to prevent halter rubs, irritation, and hair loss. These fleece halter covers are great for everyday use as well as use during trailering to provide extra protection. Features easy Velcro closures.

Halter Not Included

  • DESIGNED TO FIT ALMOST ANY HALTER - our fleece halter covers are designed to fit all major brands of leather and nylon halters, and can be cut down to size to fit smaller halters for animals such as mini horses.

  • AVAILABLE IN THREE COLORFUL OPTIONS - our animal print fleece halter covers are available in the color options White Zebra, Pink Zebra, and Leopard Print.
  • SET INCLUDES FOUR PIECES - this halter cover set includes four fleece pieces to cover the crown, both cheek pieces, and the noseband to prevent halter rubs, irritation, and hair loss that is common in these areas.
  • PREVENTS HALTER RUBS AND HAIR LOSS - our fleece covers are soft and plush and are designed to prevent your leather, nylon, or poly halter from rubbing and irritating your horse’s skin and causing hair loss.
  • NOT JUST FOR HORSE HALTERS - these fleece halter covers also make great fleece covers for collars, harnesses, or halters for other animals such as dogs and cats, cattle, sheep and goats, alpacas and llamas, and more!
